recipesJson.name: Yummy
recipesJson.author: RinVapes
recipesJson.description:
Profile inspired by an orgasm ejuice clone. https://www.ldpln.com/one-up-vapor-orgasm/
You will more than likely need to increase percentages (per the norm) as I mix low.
You can substitute the Apricot with a peach you like, if you want. ( I have issue with peach flavors so I sub'd for apricot)
You can also sub the watermelon for a different brand if you prefer. I just like PUR's.
